author: rdonkin
msg: Patch improves exception handling in test cases by allowing exceptions to be handled directly by jUnit thus preseving the stack. Submitted by Christopher Lenz
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'J2EE_14_03'.

author: rdonkin
msg: Fix for bug 11168. This bug occured when using call-method rules from xmlrules with more than one parameter. Also added test case. Patch submitted by David Wilkinson.

author: rdonkin
msg: Applied patch enabling more sophisticated classloader management for xmlrules digestion. This allows xml files packed in a ear file to be found by an xmlrules digester in j2ee server. Submitted by Henri Chen.
